experiences.name: Visual Meta GmbH
description: Responsible of maintaining Partner Dashboard, Visual Meta's b2b reporting tool, which aim is to provide statistics and reports to ladenzeile.de business customers
Charged of integrating UI/UX design according to given mockups in order to improve Partner Dashboard's ease of use and efficiency
Maintained and monitored jenkins tasks for the team

experiences.name: Zero to One Technology
description: Worked on the front and back end of Comscope, a system which automatically translates audio and video recordings of a one on one interaction into quantitative variables
Charged of integrating UI/UX design for modernization of the Comscope, e.g. recording dashboard
Worked on semantic detection in the Comscope

experiences.name: Apitic
description: Improved and maintained Apitic's software suite which is composed of an online cash register and management solutions for shops
Designed and implemented new features across back end, web front end including user interfaces and APIs
Lightened up technical debt: rewrote and refreshed modules to ease further improvement

experiences.name: Apitic
description: Conceived and developed an internal issues management system for customer service and developer team
The software had to answer the needs of the customer service team who needed an easy to navigate interface in order to take clients' requests with user rights taken into account
Doubled as a software issue management system

projects.description: Developed modules for an adaptation of ZTO's Comscope to phone conversations with the goal of deploying it to call centers by integrating UI / UX designs in collaboration with the team's designer and implemented server side APIs

description: Conceived and developed an ordering software for specific mall aisles with the collaboration of an intern
The project had to be deployed in points of a mall where employees could take customer's orders with offline capabilities and synchronization

projects.description: Conceived and developed an internal software to manage Apitic's customers subscriptions, options and billing
